title: The Unique Perspective
itunes:title: The Unique Perspective
description:
How do you rise above the BS? How do you handle the drama, the overwhelm, the upset and the ridiculous? You take the unique approach. Let's go!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfu*k Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfu*k Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
